jobs.title: Career Opportunities
jobs.subtitle: Become a Tour Guide in Tay Ninh

jobInfo.title: Job Information
jobInfo.description: Are you passionate about travel and want to introduce the beauty of Tay Ninh to tourists? We are looking for enthusiastic tour guides to join the team at Tay Ninh Travel.
duties: Guide tourists through Tay Ninh's attractions
Introduce local history, culture, and specialties
Ensure safety and best experience for tourists
Work flexibly according to tour schedules
benefitsList: Opportunity to meet and interact with domestic and international tourists
Opportunity to explore new tourist destinations

communication.title: Good Communication Skills
communication.content: Ability to communicate clearly, confidently, and friendly with tourists.

localKnowledge.title: Local Knowledge
localKnowledge.content: Deep knowledge about history, culture, and tourist attractions in Tay Ninh.

languages.title: Foreign Languages
languages.content: Priority is given to candidates who can communicate in English or other foreign languages.

certification.title: Tour Guide Certificate
certification.content: Having a tour guide certificate is an advantage (not mandatory).

applicationForm.title: Application Form
applicationForm.description: Fill in your information below to apply for the Tour Guide position at Tay Ninh Travel.
applicationForm.phoneInvalid: Invalid phone number format! Please enter 10 digits.
applicationForm.ageMinimum: You must be at least 18 years old!
applicationForm.addressPlaceholder: House number, street, ward/commune, district, province/city
applicationForm.experiencePlaceholder: Briefly describe your experience in tourism and as a tour guide (if any)
applicationForm.languagesPlaceholder: List languages you know and proficiency level (basic, intermediate, fluent)
applicationForm.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB!
applicationForm.photoTooLarge: Photo size must be less than 5MB!
applicationForm.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Share more about yourself or your special skills
applicationForm.successMessage: Your application has been submitted successfully! We will contact you as soon as possible.
applicationForm.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.
applicationForm.submissionSuccessContent: Thank you for applying! We've received your application and will review it shortly. If your qualifications match our requirements, we will contact you for the next steps.
applicationForm.loginRequired: Please log in to submit your application.
applicationForm.skillsRequired: Please select at least one skill!
applicationForm.skillsPlaceholder: Select skills relevant to the tour guide position
applicationForm.error: An error occurred while submitting the application. Please try again later.
applicationForm.fail: Application submission failed. Please check your information.
applicationForm.experienceMinLength: Experience must be at least 10 characters long

shopRegistration.title: Shop Registration
shopRegistration.subtitle: Become a Partner Shop with Tay Ninh Travel

info.title: Shop Information
info.description: Join our network of partner shops to reach more customers and grow your business with Tay Ninh Travel. We offer a professional, transparent, and mutually beneficial cooperation model.
info.modelContent: We connect your shop with tourists and local customers through our platform. You manage your products and services, while we help you reach a wider audience.
benefitsList: Expand your customer base through our tourism platform
Flexible business model, suitable for various shop types
Opportunity to participate in tourism events and programs

legal.title: Legal Business License
legal.content: Your shop must have a valid business license and operate legally.

location.title: Physical Location
location.content: Shops must have a clear address in Tay Ninh or nearby areas.

quality.title: Product/Service Quality
quality.content: Commitment to providing quality products/services and good customer care.

branding.title: Brand Image
branding.content: Shops should have a clear brand identity and professional image.

form.title: Shop Registration Form
form.description: Fill in the information below to register your shop as a partner with Tay Ninh Travel.
form.shopDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your shop, products and services...
form.logoTooLarge: Logo size must be less than 5MB!
form.licenseTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB!
form.businessCodeRequired: Please enter your business registration code!
form.successMessage: Your shop registration has been submitted successfully! We will contact you soon.
form.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your registration. Please try again later.
form.loginRequired: Please log in to register your shop.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story, mission, and team behind Tay Ninh Travel
about.storyParagraph1: Tay Ninh Travel was founded in 2010 with the desire to introduce the beauty of Tay Ninh to domestic and international tourists. From a small company with just a few employees, we have grown into one of the leading travel agencies in Tay Ninh.
about.storyParagraph2: With an experienced team deeply knowledgeable about the local area, we proudly offer memorable travel experiences, from exploring majestic Ba Den Mountain, visiting the sacred Cao Dai Holy See, to enjoying the unique cuisine of this land.
about.missionText: We are committed to providing customers with quality, safe, and memorable travel experiences in Tay Ninh. At the same time, we contribute to promoting the image, culture, and people of Tay Ninh to friends at home and abroad.
about.visionText: To become the leading travel agency in Tay Ninh and the Southeast region, trusted by customers and highly regarded by partners. We aim for sustainable tourism development, respecting the environment and local communities.

home.explore: Explore Vietnam's beauty in one day

diverseDestinations.description: Explore various exciting destinations around Hanoi

timeSaving.description: One-day tours, suitable for any schedule

hero.subtitle: Explore Vietnam's beauty in one day

featuredGuides.title: Our Professional Guides
featuredGuides.subtitle: Meet our experienced and passionate tour guides who will make your journey unforgettable

bestSellers.title: Best Selling Products
bestSellers.subtitle: Discover our most popular items that customers love

blogPosts.title: Latest News & Stories
blogPosts.subtitle: Discover the latest news, travel tips, and stories about Tay Ninh

blackLady.title: Black Lady Mountain - The Roof of Southern Vietnam
blackLady.description: Standing at 986m, Black Lady Mountain is the highest peak in Southern Vietnam, a famous spiritual and tourist destination featuring one of Vietnam's most modern cable car systems.

location.title: Gateway to Southeast
location.description: Tay Ninh is the southwestern gateway of the Southeast region, bordering Cambodia, holding a strategically important position for both economy and national security.

cuisine.title: Distinctive Cuisine
cuisine.description: Tay Ninh is famous for its specialty foods such as Trang Bang rice noodle soup, Tung Lo Mo, Go Den rice wine, shrimp salt... which have become unique culinary brands of this land.
